juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   Tall clear glass
*   Orange juice (filling the glass)
*   Orange slice (as garnish on the glass rim)
*   White drinking straw (in the glass)
*   Wooden plank surface (as depicted under the glass in Figure 1)
*   Hunting knife
*   Black knife handle
*   Silver-colored metal pommel on the knife handle
*   Silver-colored metal finger guard on the knife
*   Silver-colored, reflective clip-point knife blade
*   Text/logo markings on the knife (e.g., "BUCK", "USA")
